definition: easily/without trouble/while one is at it/in passing/handy
to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
lit. to lead away a goat while passing by (idiom)/fig. to opportunistically pocket sb's possessions and walk off

sentences.english: Now open this file with whichever command line editor you're most comfortable with.
sentences.chinese: 現在用一款你用着最順手的命令行編輯器打開此文件。

sentences.english: " said Linda Higgins, throwing a sopping brown coffee filter into the garbage can.
sentences.chinese: 辛吉斯問他，順手把用過的咖啡濾紙扔進了垃圾筒。

sentences.english: Don't tell me it was a five-finger discount .
sentences.chinese: 別跟我說那是順手牽羊偷來的。

sentences.english: On her way behind the counter to pour the cognac Tereza turned the volume up.
sentences.chinese: 她去櫃檯後面倒白蘭地，順手將音量調大了一些。

sentences.english: He helped himself to the book when nobody noticed him.
sentences.chinese: 他趁人不注意把這本書順手牽羊了。

sentences.english: He made off with a computer.
sentences.chinese: 他順手牽羊帶走了一臺電腦。

sentences.english: Ergonomic shape for easy to handle.
sentences.chinese: 人體工學造型，使用更順手。
千萬不要再在商店順手牽羊了。

sentences.english: She picked up the new nylon umbrella on the sly.
sentences.chinese: 她順手牽羊拿走了那頂新尼龍傘。

sentences.english: Smoothly to provoke a taxi fled the studio is still in Iraq.
sentences.chinese: 順手招來一輛出租車往伊尚畫室駛去。

sentences.english: Child was plumped down on the counter while she rummaged in her bag.
sentences.chinese: 她在提包裏翻找時，順手把孩子放在了櫃檯上面。

sentences.english: He walked away with both my pen and the lighter.
sentences.chinese: 他順手牽羊把我的鋼筆和打火機都拿走了。

sentences.english: This works just as well and it's more quiet.
sentences.chinese: 電鑽用起來一樣順手而且更爲安靜。

sentences.english: I had an extra copy and just handed it to him.
sentences.chinese: 我有正巧有多餘的拷貝，就順手送給了他。

sentences.english: New remote controls are much more informative, safe and comfortable to use.
sentences.chinese: 新型的遙控裝置更加信息化，安全，用起來也很順手。

sentences.english: Jiang Yan heard, they dig out from his arms, he is also a five-color pen.
sentences.chinese: 江淹聽了，就順手從懷裏取出一支五色筆來還他。

one side/either side/on the one hand/on the other hand/doing while
to come over/to manage/to handle/to be able to take care of
